data.note: Chile's electricity sector has been unbundled, leaving distinct actors in generation, transmission and distribution.
data.name: The power sector has been unbundled (whether privatized or not) into distinct actors for generation, transmission, distribution and retail

data.note: As of 2015, there were legally separate private companies in generation, transmission and distribution. There were about 175 generators, 16 transmission companies and 31 distribution companies.
data.name: There are legally separate private companies at each segment of the power system pre-retail

data.note: There are two private transmission system operators: the Northern Interconnected System (SING) and the Central Interconnected System (SIC).
data.name: There is an independent transmission system that dispatches according to market dynamics and is not susceptible to state interference

data.note: Under law 20040, Chile has a transitory subsidy applicable for up to six months for residential costumers when electricity rates increase more than 5%. This is the only subsidy in force in the country and, as it is not applied often, doesn't distort prices.
data.name: Retail electricity prices aren't distorted by subsidies
There aren't significant barriers to private sector participation in generation

data.note: Consumers can't choose retail suppliers or third-party power suppliers.
data.name: Consumers can choose retail suppliers or third-party power marketers in the retail power market

data.note: The wholesale generation market is operated by the Northern Interconnected System (SING) and the Central Interconnected System (SIC).
data.name: There is a functioning competitive wholesale generation market

data.note: There are several generators participating in the electricity market.
data.name: The generation market has many different actors and is not concentrated in the hands of a few players

data.note: There are about 30 distribution companies in the SIC and SING systems.
data.name: The supply market has many different actors and is not concentrated in the hands of a few players
